title: Buying Stuff
content:
It's been friggin' cold lately. Though tonight was alright... it's the wind that screws everything up. But that's the price of living on the coast, I guess.

I shop at Safeway when I must, Coles when absolutely necessary, and sometimes a local supermarket called Foodworks. Most of my food comes from the local grocer or the butcher. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]
